I can remember once when we were kids I'd say more teenagers about like fou thirteen fourteen this field we'd always used to go to meeting lads on a Sunday we'd erm we'd meet up in the morning at ten o'clock we'd all play football like play football till twelve and then everyone would go home and have their dinner at home like Sunday dinner and all that and erm we'd come back after and then we'd like get pissed so wou everyone would bring some wine or whatever they could nick from their parents just the fact that whatever they could someone to buy them and erm this once we weren't getting pissed we we were drinking but we weren't really getting pissed like and we were sat at the top of the field and so we were facing this way and on your right-hand side is a school like a primary school that I used to go to everyone in the village went to and then on your left is erm a separate field with a fence so you're in this field there's trees at the top and then there's a fence and then there's a golf course behind you in the for in a wood
mm

and then there's a fence and a pub and just like some empty ground sort of a field and erm at the bottom of the field there's an old fence that you have to jump over to get on to this field cos it's meant to be the primary school's field like they own it and erm we were just sat at the top of the field and we were all just sat chilling out I sat with my boyfriend and everyone else was just sat with whoever and we were all just sat chatting and we saw these white light like it was shaped like a human like a not a woman or a man just like a human it was not like really big like five foot nine or something like that in height and it sped from one side of the field to the other and it tu and behind the pub on the left were a big mansion and it opened up onto the golf course and the wood as well and it turned out that this old woman who there was a story like this old woman that had died erm she's died and then her son came back off holiday a few days later and erm he was he'd had a chat to her like how you blah blah blah and then brother found out she wo she'd died a few days later he was like oh I was only talking to her the other day and they're like hang on she died while you were on holiday like while you were abroad she died when you weren't here it's like well that's impossible cos I were talking to her like two days ago it's like no she died when you weren't here this is the first time I've been able to get to see you cos of whatever and like turns out that he was talking to a ghost that's the story anyway don't know how true it is
